nodes.text: Gorben Frak was a male bounty hunter who was hired by the Droid Gotra to get the Phylanx Redux Transmitter. He had a huge head with a tusk-encircled face, a mane of squirming tentacles, and thick fingers. He found the transmitter with his team on board the Millennium Falcon, but the Parapa Cartel attacked them, and they fought until Han Solo threw away the transmitter to the space.
